question: What is your return policy?
answer: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase with original receipt. All items must be in original condition with tags attached. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days to the original payment method.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: To return an item, contact our customer service team to receive a return authorization number. Package the item securely with the original receipt and return label. We recommend using a trackable shipping method.

question: What items cannot be returned?
answer: Personalized items, perishable goods, intimate apparel, and items damaged by misuse cannot be returned. Electronics must be returned within 14 days and in original packaging.

question: What are your shipping options?
answer: We offer Standard (5-7 business days, $5.99), Express (2-3 business days, $12.99), and Overnight (next business day, $24.99) shipping. Free shipping on orders over $50.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, Express takes 2-3 business days, and Overnight arrives the next business day. Processing time is 1-2 business days for all orders.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping takes 7-14 business days and costs $19.99. Some restrictions may apply to certain products.

question: What is your warranty policy?
answer: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty against defects. Electronics have a 2-year warranty. Warranty covers manufacturing defects but not damage from misuse or accidents.

question: How do I claim warranty service?
answer: Contact our customer service with your order number and description of the issue. We'll provide a return authorization and replacement or refund within 5-7 business days of receiving the defective item.

question: How do you protect my personal information?
answer: We use industry-standard encryption for all data transmission and storage. Your personal information is never shared with third parties except for order fulfillment. We comply with GDPR and CCPA regulations.

question: Can I delete my account and data?
answer: Yes, you can request account deletion by contacting customer service. We'll delete your personal data within 30 days, though some information may be retained for legal compliance.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through encrypted gateways.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes, we use PCI DSS compliant payment processing. Your payment information is encrypted and never stored on our servers. We partner with trusted payment processors for maximum security.

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our customer service is available Monday-Friday 9 AM - 6 PM EST and Saturday 10 AM - 4 PM EST. Online orders can be placed 24/7. We're closed on Sundays and major holidays.

question: How can I contact customer service?
answer: You can reach us by phone at 1-800-STORE-HELP, email at support@storefront.com, or through our live chat feature. Average response time is under 2 hours during business hours.

question: Do you offer customer loyalty programs?
answer: Yes! Join our loyalty program to earn points on every purchase. Get 1 point per dollar spent, plus bonus points for reviews and referrals. Points can be redeemed for discounts.
